name: Gaze of Two Minds
effects: as a bonus action, touch a willing creature and perceive through its senses until the end of your next turn
as long as the creature is on the same plane, you can take a bonus action on subsequent turns to maintain the connection, extending it until the end of your next turn
while perceiving, you benefit from the creature's special senses
you can cast spells as if you were in your space or the other creature's space if the two of you are within 60 feet of each other
